snippet: Cellphone footage showing two men being beaten by police officers, according to Fiji officials, has spurred international condemnation.
abstract: Cellphone footage showing two men being beaten by police officers in Fiji has spurred international condemnation; Fiji’s military leader Commodore Josaia Voreqe Bainimarama, also known as Frank Bainimarama, says he will stick by his police officers or anyone else that might be named in the investigation.
lead_paragraph: Cellphone footage showing two men being beaten by police officers, according to Fiji officials, has spurred international condemnation.

headline.seo: Video of Police Beating Highlights Rights Concerns in Fiji
headline.main: Video of Police Beating in Fiji Prompts Ire
headline.print_headline: Video of Police Beating in Fiji Prompts Ire

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
